availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Erwin (McLean County, Kentucky, farmer and fisherman.)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer and fisherman. Indiana native. Married to Lavisa Pinkston Erwin in Daviess County, Kentucky, on May 18, 1848. Father of Starling Asbury Erwin, Melvina Erwin Crabtree, Robert H. Erwin, Melissa Erwin, and Nancy E. Erwin. Farmer in Daviess County in 1850. Fisherman in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 438A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 6.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 186A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Daviess County Marriages, Film #005557639, p. 100.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #8228.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #18587.
